Name: Hazelnut Alexander
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: A nutty riff on the Brandy Alexander . The use of bitters is inspired.
History: Created in 2005 by James Mellnor at Maze, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Hazelnut Alexander contains 250 calories
